name: Flexi
indication: Osteoarthritis, rheumatoid arthritis and ankylosing spondylitis.
Dosage: 100 mg twice daily; Flexi SR: 200 mg once daily.

name: Ambrisan
Dosage: 5 mg once daily, maximum recommended dose 10 mg once daily.

name: Entacyd Plus
indication: Hyperacidity, peptic ulcer, gastritis, peptic oesophagitis, gastric hyperacidity, heartburn, sour stomach or hiatus hernia.
Dosage: 1-2 tablets/1-2 teaspoonful suspension 1-3 hours after meal and at bed time.

name: Antiva
indication: Antiva is indicated for the treatment of chronic hepatitis B in adults with evidence of active viral replication and either evidence of persistent elevations in serum aminotransferases (ALT or AST) or histologically active disease.
Dosage: The recommended dose of AntivaÂ® in chronic hepatitis B patients with adequate renal function is 10 mg, once daily, taken orally, without regard to food.

name: Fona Plus
indication: FonaTM Plus Gel is indicated for the topical treatment of acne vulgaris in patients 12 years of age and older.
Dosage: Apply a thin film of FonaTM Plus Gel to affected areas of the face and/or trunk once daily after washing. Use a pea-sized amount for each area of the face (e.g., forehead, chin, each cheek). Avoid the eyes, lips and mucous membranes. Fona Plus Gel is not for oral, ophthalmic, or intravaginal use.
